item.description:
Because this is the night before the 4th of July the meeting will only be held if people RSVP. If you RSVP Yes, you will be expected to attend.

We will have another meeting in Newport, Saturday the 12th of July at 5 PM. There will be further details about this meeting shortly.
item.how_to_find_us: We will have Meet Up table sign
item.why: It's a great opportunity to meet others with a similar interest in the French Language , practice your spoken French, learn and have fun.

group.name: The Providence French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Weeknight Fun with French
